alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 3:55AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... The National Weather Service in Omaha/Valley has issued a Wind Advisory, which is in effect from 5 PM this afternoon to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * WINDS...South winds this morning 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. After 5 pm this afternoon, winds will turn to the west and increase to 30 to 40 mph with gusts as high as 50 mph. * TIMING... 5 PM this afternoon through 7 AM Saturday * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa and east central, northeast and southeast Nebraska. * IMPACTS...Strong winds may blow down limbs, trees, and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that winds of 30 to 39 mph are expected for one hour or longer, or winds of 45 to 57 mph for any duration. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
